dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You stumble into Grumok's domain, puny creature! Speak quick, or be eaten slow!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the dark artifacts within this forest. Lend me your strength, and I shall share my power with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not care for puny artifacts. Grumok care for strength. Show you strong, then maybe talk.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I'll prove my strength. Let's wrestle, beast!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok like wrestle! But if you lose, Grumok feast on you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Agreed. Prepare yourself!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok ready!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: On second thought, maybe we can find another way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coward! Grumok crush weaklings!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: No, I won't fight you. I have other means to gain strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok see you weak, not worth time.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll prove to you I'm not weak! Give me a chance!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok give no more chances.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I'll leave you to your forest. Farewell, Grumok.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave quick, or Grumok change mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have dark magic that can enhance your power. Interested?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not trust magic. Magic tricky.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It's not tricky if you know how to use it. Let me show you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok still not trust. Leave or fight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fair enough, beasts don't understand true power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok crush insult!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, troll! I have no time for your games.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not like tone. You walk away, or Grumok smash!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Try smashing me, then, if you dare!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok gladly smash!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Foolish troll. Prepare to be obliterated!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok break you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Just as expected from a mindless brute.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not mindless! Grumok strong!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I'll walk away for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good choice. Grumok watch you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Remember this moment, troll. I'll be back.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not afraid. You come back, Grumok ready.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Run along now, and maybe I'll spare your life next time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not like threats. Come back and fight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Not worth my energy. Goodbye.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok tired of weaklings. Go!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You'll regret this, beast.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok regret nothing. Weaklings not matter.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Farewell, insignificant creature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not care. Leave now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I could use a brute like you in my ranks. Join me, and we shall conquer together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not follow puny creature. Grumok have own strength.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You fool. Together, we could be unstoppable!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not need help to be strong.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: So be it. I'll find stronger allies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good luck. Grumok strong alone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. Farewell, stubborn troll.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not care. Go!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your loss. Many others are eager to join me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not care for others. Leave now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You'll soon regret not joining me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok regret nothing. Go!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: They shall prove more useful than you, anyway.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not need you. Go!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Think on this, Grumok: power is greater when shared.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok need no sharing. Grumok strong alone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A pity. Your strength could have grown tenfold.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok tired of talk. Leave before Grumok smash!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then you shall remain weak in the grand scheme.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Grumok not weak! Grumok show you strength!
